dct_title_s: The Sacramento Valley from the American River to Butte Creek
dct_description_sm: surveyed & drawn by order of Genl. Riley, commandg. 10th Military Dept. by Lieut. Derby, Topl. Engrs.
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, roads, city plan of Sacramento, land ownership, etc.
Descriptive text throughout, indicating landscape, fauna, routes.
"S. Ex. Doc. No. 47, Part 2nd, 1st Sess., 31st Cong."
From Senate Executive Document 47, 31st. Congress, 1st. Session, 1850.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
